short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom newtab for your Chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab page into a beautiful and functional experience with Starry Sky New Tab. This extension features a stunning starry sky background along with real-time time and weather updates.

Key Features:

- Starry Sky Background: Relax with a beautiful starry sky background every time you open a new tab.
- Time Display: Stay on track with continuously updated, accurate time information.
- Weather Updates: Real-time weather forecasts keep you prepared for the day ahead.
